review: I, for some reason, I an Apple TV, Roku, Chrome Cast, and now this. As a whole, this is my favorite streaming device. The remote is more comparable to that of the Roku, but it feels like it is better quality. It also looks the best in my opinion. However, there are some downsides that are small, but should be addressed nonetheless.The first downside being how easy it is to accidentally purchase shows and movies through amazon prime. They make it pretty hard to see what you own and don't own, and those things that you don't can be purchased without verification. I had some friends over and they thought I owned a handful of shows that I did not and purchased them without being asked if you do or do not want to buy them!Second is the speed. Im not a computer wiz or even know what most of the technical internals are/do. But, what I do know is that they claim that this is twice as fast as the Apple TV, and its not, its about the same. Now I don't care because they are both pretty quick, but if you make a claim to be faster, I think it should be at least noticeable.As a whole, I would probably choose this over any other streaming device. The only reason why I would choose it over the Apple TV is the remote and that is it.
